channel.title: Comments on: One Month Into Pink Days
channel.description: A Year Off With Our Kids

item.title: By: Jeanne Lapp
item.dc:creator: Jeanne Lapp
item.content:encoded:
Sleeping well makes everything better!!

LikeLiked by 1 person

item.title: By: Erin
item.dc:creator: Erin
item.description:
This is so exciting! I was thrilled to see a PPD update today! I am so looking forward to watching your journey. Please know that all of your learnings are very good reminders for the rest of us 'still corporate' mommies!
Xoxoxo my friend from an exciting journey to Houston...
item.content:encoded:
This is so exciting! I was thrilled to see a PPD update today! I am so looking forward to watching your journey. Please know that all of your learnings are very good reminders for the rest of us ‘still corporate’ mommies!

Xoxoxo my friend from an exciting journey to Houston…

LikeLiked by 1 person

item.title: By: Andi Nagy
item.dc:creator: Andi Nagy
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://projectpinkday.com/portfolio/one-month-into-pink-days/comment-page-1/#comment-37">Grammy</a>.
Oh Kelly, it`s so great to read you! :-) and you truly look happy! nice hairdo btw. can`t wait to hear more from you!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Grammy.

Oh Kelly, it`s so great to read you! ðŸ™‚ and you truly look happy! nice hairdo btw. can`t wait to hear more from you!

item.title: By: Grammy
item.dc:creator: Grammy
item.description:
My Dear Girl,
You brought me to tears. Those are some pretty insightful and heart-warming learnings. I am so incredibly proud of both you and Travis for following your hearts and making this dream come true. I remember the day, long before the inception of PPD, Travis telling me his number one goal in life is to be the best dad he can possibly be. You are both amazing parents and it shows in your beautiful children's faces. I look forward to watching the four of you grow in life and love in the coming year.
Love always, Grammy
item.content:encoded:
My Dear Girl,

You brought me to tears. Those are some pretty insightful and heart-warming learnings. I am so incredibly proud of both you and Travis for following your hearts and making this dream come true.
I remember the day, long before the inception of PPD, Travis telling me his number one goal in life is to be the best dad he can possibly be. You are both amazing parents and it shows in your beautiful children’s faces.
I look forward to watching the four of you grow in life and love in the coming year.

Love always,
Grammy
